education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive educational offerings from kindergarten through high school, designed to nurture every student's potential.

kindergarten.title: Kindergarten
kindergarten.subtitle: Early Childhood Education
kindergarten.description: Our kindergarten program provides a nurturing and stimulating environment where young children develop fundamental skills through play-based learning. We focus on social, emotional, and cognitive development, preparing children for their educational journey ahead with creativity, curiosity, and confidence.

primary.title: Primary School
primary.subtitle: Elementary Education (1st - 4th Grade)
primary.description: Our primary education program builds strong foundations in literacy, numeracy, and critical thinking. Through engaging activities and personalized attention, we help students develop essential academic skills while fostering independence, creativity, and a love for learning that will serve them throughout their educational journey.

middle.title: Middle School
middle.subtitle: Basic Education (5th - 9th Grade)
middle.description: Our middle school curriculum provides comprehensive education across core subjects while introducing specialized areas of study. Students develop advanced critical thinking skills, explore their interests, and begin preparing for their future academic and career paths through diverse learning opportunities and guidance.

high.title: High School
high.subtitle: Secondary Education (10th - 12th Grade)
high.description: Our high school program offers rigorous academic preparation and specialized technical courses designed to prepare students for higher education and professional careers. With modern facilities and expert faculty, we provide comprehensive education that develops leadership, innovation, and the skills needed for success in the modern world.

regulations.title: Regulation
regulations.subtitle: Familiarize yourself with our school's rules and guidelines to ensure a safe and productive learning environment for all students.

organizationalChart.title: Organizational Chart
organizationalChart.subtitle: Understand the structure of our school and the roles of key personnel dedicated to supporting our students' success.

parentsAssociation.title: Parents Association
parentsAssociation.subtitle: Learn more about our Parents Association, which fosters collaboration between parents, students, and the school to enhance the educational experience.

eqavet.title: EQAVET - European Quality Assurance
eqavet.subtitle: Quality partnerships and protocols that enhance our educational excellence and professional development opportunities.

companies.title: Partnerships and Protocols with Companies
companies.description: Partnership with employers involves the following initiatives:
items: Organize student visits to companies to learn about professions and activities
Define a strategy for educational and professional guidance
Provide continuous training for teachers/trainers in both institutions
Share technology component trainers between institutions
Share equipment and facilities for training and experimentation sessions
Implement Work Context Training (FCT) for Professional Course students
Ensure workplace safety, health and hygiene conditions with appropriate personal protective equipment

higher_education.title: Partnerships and Protocols with Higher Education
higher_education.description: Collaboration encompasses various actions to guide professional course students to higher education in related areas. Main actions include:
items: Guidance to higher education offerings, including promotional events and integration into projects
Definition of educational and professional guidance strategy, with technical and psychosocial support
Continuous teacher training through partnerships with CFAE and other entities
Collaborative work between technology component trainers, including mentoring and research projects
Sharing of equipment and facilities for training and simulation

local_administration.title: Partnerships and Protocols with Local Administration
local_administration.description: Collaboration with local administration encompasses the following actions:
items: Define educational and professional guidance strategy, with specialized technicians and network meetings
Promote CTE through communication plans and community events
Establish a transport network for students
Provide continuous training for teachers/trainers in partnership with CFAE and other entities
Ensure maintenance of spaces and equipment

gallery.title: EQAVET Partners
gallery.subtitle: Meet our EQAVET Partners
gallery.description: Visual highlights of our quality assurance partnerships and collaborative initiatives.
